New Records: India's margin of victory was the biggest in a T20I involving two Full-Member teams
Key Match Events: New Zealand was bowled out for 66
Daryl Mitchell c Shivam Mavi b Umran Malik 35
Pre-Game Insights: Hardik Pandya used his experience of the IPL final to decide to bat first
Post-Match Reflections: Shubman Gill now has centuries in all three international formats
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the year of Shubman Gill
Others: India maintained their unbeaten series record in all formats at home since March 2019
